blacklist.description: Blacklists a channel for the usage of a command
blacklist.details: You can only whitelist or blacklist channels for command usage. Whenever a whitelist is set, it ignores the blacklist, and vice versa. Blacklists do not apply to the administrators and the bot owner(s). You can use `all` to set the blacklist for all commands. Only the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the blacklist.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to blacklist a channel for?
args.channels-prompt: [W|w]hich channel(s) would you like to blacklist for the command?

output.admin-only: [O|o]nly the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the command blacklists.
output.blacklist-applied: [T|t]he blacklist has been applied to the following commands: {{commands}}.

clear-whitelist.description: Clears the whitelisted and blacklisted channels for the usage of a command
clear-whitelist.details: You can use `all` to set the whitelist for all commands. Only the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the whitelist.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to clear the whitelist and blacklist of?

output.admin-only: [O|o]nly the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the command whitelists.
output.whitelist-removed: [T|t]he whitelist has been cleared for the following commands: {{commands}}.

disable.description: Disables a command or command group
disable.details: The argument must be the name or ID (partial or whole) of a command or a command group. Only administrators may use this command.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to disable?

enable.description: Enables a command or command group
enable.details: The argument must be the name or ID (partial or whole) of a command or a command group. Only administrators may use this command.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to enable?

groups.details: Only administrators may use this command.

load.details: The argument must be the full name of the command, formatted as `module:group:memberName`. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

args.command-prompt: [W|w]hich command would you like to load?

output.command: [T|t]he command '{{args.command.name}}' has been loaded across all shards.
output.command-shards-failed: [A|a]ttempted to load the command '{{args.command.name}}', but loading it on other shards has failed.

reload.description: Reloads a command or command group
reload.details: The argument must be the name or ID (partial or whole) of a command or a command group. Providing a command group will reload all the commands in that group. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to reload?

output.command: [T|t]he command '{{args.command.name}}' has been reloaded across all shards.
output.command-shards-failed: [A|a]ttempted to reload the command '{{args.command.name}}', but reloading it on other shards has failed.
output.group: [A|a]ll commands in the group '{{args.command.name}}' have been reloaded across all shards.
output.group-shards-failed: [A|a]ttempted to reload all the commands in the group '{{args.command.name}}', but reloading it on other shards has failed.

show-whitelist.description: Shows the whitelisted channels for a command
show-whitelist.details: The resulting channels are the channels where the specified command is allowed or disallowed to be used. These settings do not apply to administrators and the bot owner(s).

args.command-prompt: [W|w]hich command would you like to show the whitelist for?

output.command-allowed: [T|t]he command `{{args.command.name}}` is allowed to be used in all channels.
output.command-blacklist: [T|t]he command `{{args.command.name}}` is **disallowed** to be used in the following channels: {{channels}}.
output.command-whitelist: [T|t]he command `{{args.command.name}}` is **allowed** to be used in the following channels **only**: {{channels}}.

unload.details: The argument must be the name or ID (partial or whole) of a command. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

args.command-prompt: [W|w]hich command would you like to unload?

output.command: [T|t]he command '{{args.command.name}}' has been unloaded across all shards.
output.command-shards-failed: [A|a]ttempted to unload the command '{{args.command.name}}', but unloading it on other shards has failed.

whitelist.description: Whitelists a channel for the usage of a command
whitelist.details: You can only whitelist or blacklist channels for command usage. Whenever a whitelist is set, it ignores the blacklist, and vice versa. Whitelists do not apply to the administrators and the bot owner(s). You can use `all` to set the whitelist for all commands. Only the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the whitelist.

args.cmdOrGrp-prompt: [W|w]hich command or command group would you like to whitelist a channel for?
args.channels-prompt: [W|w]hich channel(s) would you like to whitelist for the command?

output.admin-only: [O|o]nly the administrators and bot owner(s) may change the command whitelists.
output.whitelist-applied: [T|t]he whitelist has been applied to the following commands: {{commands}}.
